on_hit_ground_ability.description: The ability to play when the object hits the ground.

on_start_descent_ability.description: The ability to play when the object starts the descent.

on_init_ability.description: The ability to play when the object is setup (and not already descended).

on_done_hotjoin_ability.description: The ability to play when the object has already descended and player joins late.

on_debug_reset_ability.description: The ability to play to reset for debug

time_until_triggered_min.description: Delay until we trigger the fall min

time_until_triggered_max.description: Delay until we trigger the fall max

base_time_added_per_instance.description: Time that is added per instance of the component, so they fall throughout a mission
